title: Phase 3: Path optimization - minimize pen-up travel
description: Reorder paths using nearest-neighbor algorithm to minimize pen-up travel distance. Consider path reversal when endpoint is closer. Merge connected paths to reduce pen cycles.

title: Fix coordinate system for frames
description:
Currently uses absolute document coordinates for 0,0 origin. Better workflow:
1. Check if selected paths are inside a frame
2. IF in a frame: use frame's top-left corner as 0,0 origin
3. ELSE: create a new frame with 5mm margin around selected paths, use that as origin

This ensures G-code coordinates are relative to the artwork bounds, not the entire Figma document.
close_reason: Implemented frame-based origin: uses containing frame if selection is inside one, otherwise creates a new frame with 5mm margin
